name: Add rows to a Google Sheet from PagerDuty incidents
description: Every time a new incident is triggered in PagerDuty, Make will automatically add a new row to a Google Sheet. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1lNJLA2r3l3lZeKgcbFCkgrQ6j8rtrxMtvsh-gecJPoM/edit#gid=0).
